chapter.title: Solaris Express Languages Package List

highlights.para: This chapter lists and describes the packages that support languages in the Solaris Express software.
The languages package list is divided into the following platform-specific tables.

para.olink: Solaris Express Languages Packages for SPARC Based Systems
Solaris Express Languages Packages for x86 Based Systems

chapter.sect1:
Solaris Express Languages Packages for SPARC
Based Systems
The following table lists the languages packages for the Solaris Express software
for SPARC based systems.&sparclanguagepackages-sxde;

Solaris Express Languages Packages for x86 Based
Systems
The following table lists the languages packages for the Solaris Express software
for x86 based systems.&x86languagepackages-sxde;
